subject: Traffic survey
text: #Rdu 74tv <THTf wfaarvT TH / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (@a Wa87, 43v 4Raa7T 3< {NhTT TAT4) 547 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India QH. IExtn = 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) #-5 Qa 6, #+7-10, ETrVT; 7f faraf-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, Delhi-110075 NHAI/13013/558/C0/10-11/ AIMTC 13.08.2010 Circular No : NHAI Commercial Operation/ 124 Sub:- Traffic survey. All the project directors, under whose jurisdinction, fee collection is going on on an public funded or BOT (Annuirty)   projects are here   by directed to arrange to conduct a traffic survey for 24 hrs continuously to ascertain the following data; 1 . Number of total vehicles crossed the plaza categorywise as stated in the enclosed format. 2 Number of vehicles crossed the plaza having regisration no of the District where the fee plaza is situated. 3 . Number of empty vehicles crossed the plaza. All Concerned PDs are authorised to hire desired manpower as per the approved rates from the fee collecting agency | ATS / TS suppliers/ Supervision Consultant etc for the traffic survey. The survey must be conduct in such a way that all information desired in the enclosed format can be provided  Before start of the survey, the Project Directors or his authorised officers are supposed to give a_ detailed briefing SO that there may not be any misunderstanding regarding classification and recording etc. The information is required within 3 in the enclosed format. V 13' (J K Pandey) CGM (CO) Encl: - As above. To_ All PIU's/ CMU's 1. All ROs. 2 . Librarian Z:IGM(COJIDGM(COJ Ammendment of Fee Rule 2O08LAIMTCINote doc HT T Tw NHAL New days 8,10 Copy to,
